roleset.name: make a mark

example.name: common example.
example.note: This is tricky because it could be both the mark and the surface. It is possible to have another arg 1 (such as a purple dot marking the site), so this is arg 2.

example.name: with arg 1
example.text: He didn't like her marking of an 'X' on the map because it ruined the way the page looked.

roleset.note: Comparison to mark-v. Mark is a member of VN class image_impression-25.1. Framed by Katie.
